title: Picks & Bans: The brawlers of EDG

replies.body: How come this one didn't get a fancy video? I really liked those..
i can give u  im chinese

Roit doesn't like LPL team

Unfortunately, due to a number of logistical reasons, we couldn't get a video out for this in time for MSI. We would have loved to, but it just wasn't in the cards :(

Trust us, we're as bummed as y'all are.
BULLSHIT
Yup, I guess it just wasn't in the cards {{champion:4}}
the LPL hate is real !!!  So disappointed !!
1. hi
i wondered about that too
Looks like Tencent spoilt his little son:(   lel
Pawn is not the key to win Game 5 of LPL final.....but he did good job in later game.

Indeed. Actually, I think his performance is just normal. But his counter-pick of Morgana gave both he and his team an advantage over Faker's LeBlanc. And when Faker's teammates behaved unsatisfactory, e.g Bang's Urgot, SKT was due to lose.
Other 5 teams all have their own videos. But why is there not a video description of LPL region??? Are you RIOT trying to ignore EDG?? Like WTF?? Stop ur fuking bias aginst LPL Rito!! jeez!

"Unfortunately, due to a number of logistical reasons, we couldn't get a video out for this in time for MSI. We would have loved to, but it just wasn't in the cards :(

Trust us, we're as bummed as y'all are.

Riot RoboTayCo"

You may have missed it, but they ended up explaining why the video didn't happen.
Also, show some self-restraint man. Don't get so angry over one video.

DId you notice that at the end of today's matches, in the recap video of every matches, they showed winning clips for every winning teams, but a losing teamfight clip abt edg for the game which edg won, so dont give me that crap that riot isn't biased.
Tencent bought a dog which was not very obedient.

Interesting comment. While I agree with everything said, I can't help but feel the forced nature of a lot of the statements about Koro/Clearlove and even Meiko (I thought it was Azure). That being said, I think SKT v EDG will be a very good match.

wow wow wow, firstly, you might not  watch even one match of EDG in LPL earnest, and msi, too. Can you understand the definition of strong and weak? How EDG made into semifinals? And secondly, how EDG lost the match of their first time vs SKT on msi? Pawn and Deft can not carry clearlove, korol and meiko? Or, deft makes too much mistakes in that match? Thirdly, can you find any top laner stronger than korol in the whole msi, and any jungle stronger than clearlove? benji? huni? mountain? marine? sorry, they all lost their lane vs EDG. according to your logic, the one who deal the more damage, get the more kills, is more strong? 5 players of in EDG express very well as their own role, and, the point you mentioned EDG is weak in early game, let me tell you, that is, as one of the best teams in the world, both skt and edg will not give their the opportunity to comeback if they get advantage in the early game.(i do not expect you understand this point) Last, even  the official editor like you have such a poor understand on this game, i think that's one of the reason the team in Europe just stop at the S2. Please, just talking the things you really understand.
i dont understand this ! They win this?
gg
